info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chemung, southwestern Tioga, southeastern Steuben and northwestern Bradford Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lowman, or near Elmira, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Erin around 535 PM EDT. Chemung around 545 PM EDT. Lockwood around 550 PM EDT. Sayre and Waverly around 555 PM EDT. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 48 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
